issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw:
There were a lot of things posted to this issue. I think this issue used to be about problems on some machines in which the hard-coded delays were incorrect, so people have been changing the delays manually? In that vein, I have changed the title of this issue. If people are having Valkyrie fall during start-up that is not related to delay times in the start-up script, please create a new issue.

Also, I have been working on a script that sleeps according to the ROS clock (b296af2), which should make the startup script more repeatable. I haven't finished testing it, though. I'll make a pull request once it is ready for testing.
